Function Documentation

BOOL FindDevices ( TDeviceInfo *  DeviceList,
int *  DeviceCount,
int  MaxCount,
TUpdateStatusEvent  UpdateStatusProc 
)

Discover all connected BioRadio 150 devices, and return a list including info about those found, (currently just the port name (ex., 'COM3') to which the base station is connected.)

Parameters:
DeviceListarray to populate with DeviceInfo structures
DeviceCountnumber of devices found
MaxCountcardinality of DeviceList array (the maximum number of devices for which to search)
UpdateStatusProcreference to callback procedure used to deliver information on ongoing status
Returns:
error-free execution
BOOL FindDevicesSimple ( char *  DevicePortNameList[],
int *  DeviceCount,
int  MaxDeviceCount,
int  PortNameStrLen 
)

Discover all connected BioRadio 150 Devices, and return a list including port names for those found. A simpler version than FindDevices; not requiring custom data structure or callback status function.

Parameters:
DevicePortNameListarray of char string pointers, allocated to be populated with port names of found devices
DeviceCountnumber of devices found
MaxDeviceCountcardinality of DevicePortNameList array (the maximum number of devices for which to search)
PortNameStrLencardinality of the char strings allocated and pointed to by the DevicePortNameList array (10 suggested)
Returns:
success: device(s) found (1) or failure (0)
int SetDebugging ( DWORD  BioRadio150,
char  value = true 
)

Turn on logging of various data to debug files.

Parameters:
BioRadio150object handle
valueset debugging On (1) or Off (0)
Returns:
success (1) or no device object at handle (-1)
